TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi TickBar extends System.Windows.FrameworkElement

summary.span: 代表控制項，可為 控制項繪製一組刻度標記。

span.span: Represents a control that draws a set of tick marks for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項繪製刻度標記，具有一個像素的寬度。The control draws tick marks that have a width of one pixel. 您可以藉由指定重複的間隔或一系列明確點定義刻度的位置。You can define the location of the tick marks by specifying a repeating interval or a series of explicit points. 控制項專為搭配控制項。The control is specifically designed to work with a control. A顯示刻度。A displays tick marks. 下圖顯示具有。The following illustration shows a that has a . **TickBar 與滑桿****Slider with a TickBar** ![滑桿圖例](~/add/media/genericslider.png "滑桿圖例")![Slider illustration](~/add/media/genericslider.png "Slider illustration") 控制項通常定義在的。 controls are typically defined in the of a . 如需隨附之 ，請參閱[滑桿樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/slider-styles-and-templates.md)。For an example of a that is included in a , see [Slider Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/slider-styles-and-templates.md). 和控制項都會包含執行相同的函式的屬性。The and controls both contain properties that perform the same function. 下表顯示屬性和對應會將繫結的屬性。The following table shows the properties and the corresponding properties to which they are bound. 屬性優先時和同時指定相關的屬性。The properties take precedence when and properties that are related are both specified. **相關的 TickBar 和滑桿屬性****Related TickBar and Slider Properties** | 屬性 property| 屬性 property| |------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| ||| |||

summary.span: 取得或設定 是否顯示選取範圍。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the displays a selection range.

value.span: 如果會顯示選取範圍，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if a selection range is displayed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和屬性會定義選取範圍。The and properties define a selection range. 這些屬性必須設定為選取範圍時顯示設`true`。These properties must be set for the selection range to appear when is set to `true`. 下圖顯示包含控制項具有定義的選取範圍。The following illustration shows a control that contains a that has a selection range defined. ![Slider 的選取範圍](~/add/media/sliderselectionrange.GIF "Slider 的選取範圍")![Slider selection range](~/add/media/sliderselectionrange.GIF "Slider selection range") ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

summary.span: 取得或設定刻度標記可能的最大值。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum value that is possible for a tick mark.

value.span: 刻度標記可能的最大值。

span.span: The largest possible value for a tick mark.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要刻度會顯示為和值和次要刻度會顯示其他的值。Primary ticks are displayed for the and values, and secondary ticks are displayed for other values. 針對水平，主要刻度的高度等於的。For a horizontal , the height of the primary ticks is equal to the of the . 針對垂直，主要刻度的寬度是否等於的。For a vertical , the width of the primary ticks is equal to the of the . 次要刻度的大小為 75%的主要刻度的大小。The size of the secondary ticks is 75 percent of the size of the primary ticks. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

span.span: The that is used to draw the ticks.

summary.span: 繪製 控制項的刻度標記。

span.span: Draws the tick marks for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性和屬性決定繪製刻度標記的位置。The values of the property and the property determine where tick marks are drawn in a . 主要刻度會顯示為和值和次要刻度會顯示其他的值。Primary ticks are displayed for the and values, and secondary ticks are displayed for other values. 針對水平，主要刻度的高度等於的。For a horizontal , the height of the primary ticks is equal to the of the . 針對垂直，主要刻度的寬度是否等於的。For a vertical , the width of the primary ticks is equal to the of the . 次要刻度的大小為 75%的主要刻度的大小。The size of the secondary ticks is 75 percent of the size of the primary ticks. 這個方法也會繪製刻度開頭和結尾的選取範圍，如果屬性是`true`如果和屬性都有效。This method also draws ticks at the beginning and the end of a selection range if the property is `true` and if the and properties are valid.

span.span: Gets or sets where tick marks appear relative to a of a control.

value.span: 列舉值，識別 的 配置中， 的位置。

span.span: A enumeration value that identifies the position of the in the layout of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值會用來確定的可見部分，例如選取範圍的結束點指標會正確顯示。The value is used to make sure that the visible parts of the , such as the end point indicators of a selection range, are displayed correctly. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

public: property double ReservedSpace { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.ReservedSpace : double with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定區域的空間緩衝區，該區域包含針對 指定的刻度標記。

span.span: Gets or sets a space buffer for the area that contains the tick marks that are specified for a .

value.span: 表示在刻度標記之列或行的任一端上，緩衝區域總計的值。

span.span: A value that represents the total buffer area on either side of the row or column of tick marks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所定義的空間緩衝區屬性設計來計算的空間，控制項使用時的任一端。The space buffer that is defined by the property is designed to account for the space that the control uses when it is at either end of the . 值屬性就會劃分成兩半。The value of the property is divided in half. 一個一半空間做為其中一端的刻度標記集合的緩衝區，另一半的空間做為集合的另一端上的緩衝區。One half of the space is used as a buffer on one side of the tick mark collection, and the other half of the space is used as a buffer on the other side of the collection. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

summary.span: 取得或設定刻度標記之間的間隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval between tick marks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為值不是`null`、屬性不使用。If the property is set to a value that is not `null`, the property is not used. 繪製刻度標記的位置由所指定的間隔屬性的值開始屬性並繼續進行之前的值屬性為止。Tick marks are drawn at the interval that is specified by the property, starting at the value of the property and continuing until the value of the property is reached. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

span.span: Gets or sets the positions of the tick marks.
A that specifies the locations of the tick marks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 刻度標記所定義的屬性，且可在所定義的範圍之外和屬性值不會出現。Tick marks that are defined by the property and that are outside the range that is defined by the and property values do not appear. 當設定屬性，則屬性不使用。When the property is set, the property is not used. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||
